data.text: Awurade, mefi me koma nyinaa mu ada wo ase.
Mɛma mʼani agye na madi ahurusi wɔ wo mu.
Mʼatamfo san wɔn akyi;
Woadi mʼasɛm ama me, na menya mʼahofadi;
Woatwe amanaman no aso, na woasɛe amumɔyɛfo.
Ɔsɛe a enni awiei ato ɔtamfo no,
Awurade di hene daa daa;
Ɔde trenee bebu wiase atɛn;
Awurade yɛ guankɔbea ma wɔn a wodi wɔn nya no,
Wɔn a wonim wo din no de wɔn ho bɛto wo so,
Monto ayeyi dwom mma Awurade a ɔte ahengua so wɔ Sion;
Na ɔkae nea ɔtɔ mogya so were no;
Awurade, hwɛ sɛnea mʼatamfo teetee me!
na matumi apae mu aka wʼayeyi
Amanaman mufo atɔ amoa a wɔatu no mu;
Awurade atɛntrenee da no adi;
Amumɔyɛfo san kɔ ɔda mu,
Nanso ɛnyɛ daa na ne werɛ befi ohiani,
Sɔre! Awurade, mma ɔdesani nni nkonim,
Bɔ wɔn hu, Awurade;
